resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK
components.description: Any integration or issues with the TiSDK

fields.description: We need much more helpful command line help. We list the valid commands and options, but we don't list them in any detail whatsoever, nor do we have examples. In addition, we should probably consider a syntax where you can do a generic {{alloy help}} call, or a help call that is specific to each command, like this: {{alloy help compile}}. The command-specific help could function just like it does for {{git}}.

comments.body: We won't be putting further effort into the Alloy CLI particulars since this will eventually be driven through the titanium CLI.
